FuncDef: This command configures the interval in seconds between hello messages issued on this interface at this level. This command is valid only for interfaces on control B-VPLS.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the hello interval, in seconds, expressed as a decimal integer. Values-1 to 20000.

ExtraInfo: Default: hello-interval 3 (for the designated intersystem)hello-interval 9 (for non-designated intersystems)
